mapper.select: select c.challengeNo, c.clgTitle, c.img, c.recruitment, c.period, mc.payment, c.clgGroup, count_user from mychallenge mc, challenge c, (select count(userNo) count_user from mychallenge where challengeNo = {==count==}) where mc.challengeNo = c.challengeNo and c.clgTitle like {==search==};
